item.title: Heifer International Now Accepts Bitcoin Donations Through BitPay - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Heifer International Now Accepts Bitcoin Donations Through BitPay - NEWSBTC

Heifer International, the leading US-based nonprofit organization will soon be accepting bitcoin donations from across the world. Read more... The non-profit industry is definitely warming up to the thought of adopting bitcoin as an additional channel for receiving donations. Heifer International, a 72-year-old nonprofit has become the latest one to join the ranks by tying up with BitPay.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Sell-Off To $650
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Sell-Off To $650

Bitcoin price made a corrective high at $705 (Bitstamp) and was then sold off to $650 for the duration of the day. What the market does next will determine trend for the next week. This analysis is provided by xbt.social with a 3-hour delay. Read the full analysis here.

item.title: Go Iceland Promotion! - Genesis Mining
item.description:
Go Iceland Promotion! - Genesis Mining

As you probably know we are huge fans of Iceland. It is a lovely country with even more lovely people, and a big partner in our service, since many of our mining facilities are based there. Like many others we are amazed at their performance in the UEFA EM 2016, as they have now entered...

item.title: Ethereum Price Weekly Analysis - ETH Approaching Breakout - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Weekly Analysis - ETH Approaching Breakout - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price remained under a bearish pressure this past week, and it looks like ETH may continue to face offers in the near term. Ethereum price remained under a bearish pressure this past week, and it looks like ETH may continue to face offers in the near term.

item.title: Bitcoin News for the week of 6/27/16
item.description:
Bitcoin News for the week of 6/27/16

Welcome to our weekly bitcoin news recap, where we cover top headlines and stories in the world of bitcoin each week. We're proud to say that this week Blockchain was recognized as a Technology Pioneer by the World Economic Forum.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Weekly Analysis - BTC/USD Sighting More Gains? - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Weekly Analysis - BTC/USD Sighting More Gains? - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price recently moved above a major resistance area, and if the current break is true, there are chances of more upsides in BTC/USD. Bitcoin price recently moved above a major resistance area, and if the current break is true, there are chances of more upsides in BTC/USD.

item.title: Proposed Revisions to Satoshi's White Paper Stir Community Uproar
item.description:
Proposed Revisions to Satoshi's White Paper Stir Community Uproar

It seems the owner of Bitcoin.org, who goes by the name of "Cobra," wants to make some Also read: OTC Trading For Regular People: Search For the 'Uber of Bitcoin' changes to Satoshi Nakamoto's original white paper that is located on the website.

item.title: Visa Europe: Blockchain is More Interesting than Bitcoin
item.description:
Visa Europe: Blockchain is More Interesting than Bitcoin

Transitioning from traditional payments to their mobile counterparts is quite a challenge, even for Visa Europe. Blockchain technology is of particular interest to this institution, similar to how a lot of banks are keen on distributed ledgers as well. Bitcoin enthusiasts are thoroughly convinced digital payments are the way forward.

item.title: Bitcoin Remittance App Abra Now Available In US
item.description:
Bitcoin Remittance App Abra Now Available In US

The Abra team has a plan to expand the availability of their mobile apps to different countries in the coming months Abra is a Bitcoin remittance application a lot of people seem to have high hopes for. Ever since the company raised money to bring their project to the masses, things had gone quiet.
